name: Router1
description: Router1 is a high-performance networking device designed for large-scale enterprise networks. It offers advanced features for routing data between networks, ensuring secure connections through VPNs, and optimizing network traffic. With Cisco's reputation for quality, Router1 is a reliable choice for your organization's network needs.

name: Switch1
description: Switch1 is a 24-port managed switch ideal for office use. It provides network segmentation and management with D-Link's quality assurance. It's an active device, ensuring smooth office network operations.

name: Firewall1
description: Firewall1 is an enterprise-grade firewall with advanced security features. Fortinet's reputation for cybersecurity makes it a top choice for protecting your network against threats. It's an active guardian for your network.

name: AccessPoint1
description: AccessPoint1 is a wireless access point for home and small office use. Linksys delivers reliable dual-band WiFi, ensuring seamless connectivity for your devices.

name: Switch2
description: Switch2 is an 8-port unmanaged switch designed for small networks. It's a cost-effective solution for expanding your network's capacity.

name: Router2
description: Router2 is a mid-range router with VPN support, making it suitable for remote access and secure connections. It's currently inactive but ready for deployment when needed.

name: AccessPoint2
description: AccessPoint2 is a dual-band WiFi access point designed for home users. It provides reliable and fast wireless connectivity for all your home devices.
